1.title: Episode #11.1
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: 20 girls compete against each other to win the heart of 2 boys, Varun and Vishal. Girls select their weakest few who get a chance to go on a date. 3 girls are eliminated by the King.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Ranvijay reduces the prize money to half on violation of a rule. The girls in the dumping zone go on a date. Arti gets eliminated.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: A wild card female, Prianca, makes her way into splitsvilla. The 'bajate raho' session with Ranvijay doesn't go down nicely. Hoorzan is insulted and dumped out of the show.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: The girls get a chance to win a special date with the 2 boys. The girls get to dump one girl from the unsafe zone. Raghu surprises everyone as he changes the face of the game.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: The 'bajate raho' session brings up the topic of best and worst body which the boys decide via a ramp walk. Anubha and Shruti are dumped by the boys.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: The 'bajate raho' session calls for glamour in the girls as they prep up for a photo shoot. Vishal and Varun judge the photographs. Meenakshi gets dumped by the girls.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: The girls have to perform a sensuous dance for the boys. Raghu hosts the round and announces that Annie will be dumped.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Girls get divided into two teams representing each of the boys to win a special date. Team Vishal stands in the dumping zone. Hannah and Yamini are dumped from the show.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: The 'bajate raho' session once again divides the girls into two teams representing each of the guys. The winning team will have the power of elimination. Bosky is eliminated.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: The competition is divided into two phases. Varun gives the shocking vote of all. Bianca gets eliminated in the end.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Ex-Roadies visit the villa to support their friends Vishal and Varun. They interact with the girls in order to understand their bonding with the guys. Ritu gets eliminated.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: First the girls share their perspectives. Later, the boys talk to the girls individually for their survival strategy. Shraddha becomes the queen. Prianca and Heena get eliminated.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: After the huge battle, Shraddha becomes the queen of Season 1 and to win her, Vishal and Varun fight. Vishal defeats Varun in the tasks and become the winner.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Shraddha and Vishal share their experiences. They talk about their bonding with the other contestants as well as reveal the strategy they used to win the title.

1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: Nikhil Chinappa introduces 10 girls and 10 guys. A king and queen are elected. Varun and Sakshi are dumped by Mohit and Joanna.

2.title: Episode #2.2
2.plot: Two new members, Ashutosh and Sakshi enter the villa. Later, contestants walk the ramp and show off their moves to impress the King and Queen. Meenakshi and Suyash get dumped.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: The Splitsvillans pair up to be safe from the dumping zone. The king and the queen of the show come down to meet the other contestants.

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: Meherzaan quits because of illness. Cheshta and Ritika have a cat fight which upsets VJ Nikhil. Cheshta gets dumped and later VJ Rannvijay brings a twist.

5.title: Episode #2.5
5.plot: In the quest for King and Queen's throne, contestants perform their best in a chilling (literally!) task. Siddharth and Ritika become the challengers. Laughter ensues when Siddharth and Mohit abuse each other.

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: The girls compete in collecting underwear from random boys at the beach. Later, the challengers Siddharth and Joanna become the new King and Queen. Shikha and Aman get dumped.

7.title: Episode #2.7
7.plot: A quiz happens between the girls and the boys after which the boys are made to wear swim suits. In the end, Nalini is the 5th girl to be dumped by Siddharth.

8.title: Episode #2.8
8.plot: Nikhil gives the girls the chance to get back at their foes; the right to dump one guy they hate the most. Mohit, Rahul and Varun are pushed into the dumping zone. In the end, Joanna dumps Rahul.

9.title: Episode #2.9
9.plot: Nikhil announces an interesting way to stay in the game. Sell your belongings and buy gifts for Queen Joanna. Competition is fierce and the Queen is hard to please.

10.title: Episode #2.10
10.plot: With planning and plotting and convincing the boys, three girls have to face the dumping ground threat. Sakshi Bhayana is dumped by Siddharth.

11.title: Episode #2.11
11.plot: The show kicks off with the Screw You Quiz; and a twist of dumping a boy and a girl. However, Ritika and Bhav Aman are dumped in the end.

12.title: Episode #2.12
12.plot: The king and the queen compete to win the power of elimination. Nikhil throws a twist at them. When the decision is taken Nikhil throws yet another twist. Param and Stuti are evicted.

13.title: Episode #2.13
13.plot: Before the grand finale of love and war, Nikhil Chinappa shows a quick recap of the entire journey of the Splitsvillans and how have the final four reached where they are.

14.title: Episode #2.14
14.plot: Ex- splitsvillans welcome the final two pairs with anger and contempt. Later, the guys get into dizzy boxing. In the end, the pairs are tested for points.

15.title: Episode #2.15
15.plot: There is a dance competition between the girls and a trash talking competition between the boys. Siddharth and Sakshi win the competition while Joanna and Mohit get voted out.

1.title: Episode #3.1
1.plot: Season 3 takes off in Phuket, Thailand. Nikhil Chinappa and Depti greet the contestants followed by a steamy photo shoot. The king and the queen dump two people.

2.title: Episode #3.2
2.plot: The men in pairs are sold off in an auction at a lady boy bar. Ruchi and Amanjot are dumped, but Hemant chooses to switch positions with Amanjot and gets evicted.

3.title: Episode #3.3
3.plot: Nikhil helps the pair change their partners for someone they like better. The king and queen yet again face challengers. Kiran and Parag get dumped in the end.

4.title: Episode #3.4
4.plot: The contestants have to perform a traditional dance. Arjun and Pooja lose their throne to Mahip and Niharika. Kriti and Safzal get dumped.

5.title: Episode #3.5
5.plot: The girls and boys face a royal rumble and the last man and woman standing would be challengers. Pavitra is the new queen. Raman and Nirmal get dumped.

6.title: Episode #3.6
6.plot: The 'split n stick' session does its work. The pairs cook crab and the winner will challenge the king and the queen. Raj gets dumped as the splitsvillans save Riya.

7.title: Episode #3.7
7.plot: The couples have to cement trolley each other to the destination. Niharika and Ahshish become the new king and queen. In the end, Arjun is dumped.

8.title: Episode #3.8
8.plot: To stand as a contender the couples have to squash juice out of the grapes. Ashish and Niharika win the throne. Riya is dumped by the new king and the queen.

9.title: Episode #3.9
9.plot: Riya is called back to replace Pooja. To qualify as a challenger the splitsvillans have to win a salsa task. Riya and Vikas win the throne.

10.title: Episode #3.10
10.plot: Niharika gets dumped. The pairs have to sell aphrodisiacs to win the task . Pavitra and Mahip win the challenge and take the thrones. In the dumping ground matters heat up when Monika slaps Ashish.

11.title: Episode #3.11
11.plot: Ashish aggressively throws stuff around and later calms down. Rafting for fun is one thing, but it's probably the hardest task the contestants have attempted so far at the villa.

12.title: Episode #3.12
12.plot: Mahip and Monika get eliminated in the dumping zone. Eliminated contestants come back to the Villa as the finalists prepare to perform the millstone rescue challenge.

13.title: Episode #3.13
13.plot: The grand finale task begins to test the faith and trust between the final 2 couples. Parag Chadha and Riya Bamniyal win the season.

1.title: Episode #4.1
1.plot: The premiere of season 4 begins in the exotic location, Palm Jumeirah with the introduction of all the contestants. Later, the girls are divided into 3 Qabilas, each headed by a King.

2.title: Episode #4.2
2.plot: The girls have their first cat fight and splitsvilla gets its first king, Manish. Unable to form better bonding with the King, Yashita gets dumped in the end.

3.title: Episode #4.3
3.plot: The girls engage in a brawl in their room. Later in the task among the 3 Qabilas, Manish's Qabila wins, thus making him the king for the second time. Manish dumps Sohfi.

4.title: Episode #4.4
4.plot: Ashish becomes the new king of a Qabila. Girls win the sizzling 'Slip and Slide' task. After a lot of twists and turns in the dumping zone, Ruchita gets dumped by Ashish.

5.title: Episode #4.5
5.plot: The guys have to wrestle with each other in order to win the title of the king. Manish retains his throne. After a lot of convincing by the girls, Manish dumps Shrishtti.

6.title: Episode #4.6
6.plot: Nikhil brings in a surprise, a new king in the villa, Sai. He interacts with the girls to invite them to join his Qabila. The game becomes tougher when the eliminated girls are brought back.

7.title: Episode #4.7
7.plot: In the quest to become the King, boys compete with the girls in order to win the 'Maxim' swimming task. Ashish wins it to become the King for the second time. Ashish has to dump two girls.

8.title: Episode #4.8
8.plot: Amidst confusion, Ashish makes up his mind to dump Ruchita. Sai's Qabila wins the dance competition. Dimple, Vartika, and Sohfi are pushed into the dumping zone by Sai's queens.

9.title: Episode #4.9
9.plot: Sai dumps Vartika at the beginning of the show. Later, the girls are surprised as VJ Nikhil tells them about the 'Bajatey Raho' session which is going to test their intelligence quotient.

10.title: Episode #4.10
10.plot: Girls in the unsafe zone take advantage of the modish date with the King as they try to impress him. In the end, Dimple is betrayed by Ashish as he dumps her.

11.title: Episode #4.11
11.plot: An alliance is formed in the task 'Hug of War'. Dushyant wins after a tie breaker task between him and Manish. In the 'Bajatey Raho' session, three girls are stuck in the dumping zone.

12.title: Episode #4.12
12.plot: Payal, Aakriti, and Priya are in the dumping zone. They go on a beach date with Dushyant. The contestants confess their feelings for each other. Dushyant dumps Payal.

13.title: Episode #4.13
13.plot: The four Qabilas form an alliance into two groups to compete in the 'Kiss or Slap' task. Sai and Dushyant's alliance wins the task. Dushyant once again becomes the king, he dumps Sanjana.

14.title: Episode #4.14
14.plot: Boys compete with each other in a task of milking camels. Dushyant becomes the new King and uses his power to dissolve all the Qabilas to form new ones. Sohfi is dumped.

15.title: Episode #4.15
15.plot: Nikhil sets up a quiz competition for girls and every wrong answer will punish the Qabila leader. The girls from Ashish's Qabila win and make him the new King. Ashish dumps Aakriti.

16.title: Episode #4.16
16.plot: VJ Anusha brings a surprise that allows the king to dump an entire Qabila. After the powerful 'Last Man Standing' task, is the dumping zone, in which Manish dumps Ashish's Qabila.

17.title: Episode #4.17
17.plot: The gamble of love has reached the finale. A roulette game based on luck is set for the final three couples. After the final face-off, Dushyant and Priya are the winners of the fourth season of MTV Splitsvilla.

18.title: Episode #4.18
18.plot: Post the gamble of love, it's time for the award ceremony. Host Nikhil Chinappa comes up with several categories, and announces the winner in the form of rushes from the show.

1.title: Episode #5.1
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Episode #5.2
2.plot: The girls try to seduce the King in order to be safe from dumping zone. After the sizzling hot round, Akansha gets eliminated from the game.

3.title: Episode #5.3
3.plot: Love goes wild as Sikander proposes to Swati for pairing up. This time it's the boys' turn to get eliminated and the girls are safe. Paras gets eliminated.

4.title: Episode #5.4
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

5.title: Episode #5.5
5.plot: The contestants have to choose 2 Splitsvillains who will go head to head with the King and Queen. Nikhil and Rupa qualify to challenge the King and Queen.

6.title: Episode #5.6
6.plot: Nikhil and Rupa have to face Shivangini and Vroon in the boxing-puzzle task showing their physical as well as mental strength. Vroon manages to defeat Nikhil, Rupa dethrones Shivangini.

7.title: Episode #5.7
7.plot: Nikhil and Vidushi turn out to be the most dishonest in the 'Bajate Raho' session. Rishipal, Aviskha, Paras and Akanksha come back to the villa. Avishka and Nikhil get dumped in the end.

8.title: Episode #5.8
8.plot: From sizzling hot Silhouette dances to an unexpected elimination, the show has gone wild and the competition has became tougher. After a lot of twists and turns, Tasneem gets eliminated.

9.title: Episode #5.9
9.plot: Splitsvillians reveal each other's secrets. The boys compete with each other in the courageous 'Line of Fire' task. In the end, Ali gets dumped.

10.title: Episode #5.10
10.plot: After the bickering between the girls in the 'Bajate Raho' session, contestants gear up for the 'Hangman' competition. Later in the dumping zone, Rishi and Shivangini get eliminated.

11.title: Episode #5.11
11.plot: Contestants try to impress the King and the Queen. Rishabh and Vidushi get eliminated in the dumping zone. Previously eliminated contestants come back with a brawl.

12.title: Episode #5.12
12.plot: Shivangini and Jasmine have a cat fight. King Vroon and Jasmine win the task. Next morning, Nikhil kicks Saif out of the show for raising a hand on Rishabh.

13.title: Episode #5.13
13.plot: Akansha and Paras win the semi final and compete with Vroon and Jasmine in the finale. After the toughest competition of the season, Paras and Akansha become the winners.

1.title: Episode #6.1
1.plot: The contestants are warmly welcomed to the exotic location, Kerala. First, the HQ session takes place, followed by a task. Parichay and Peenaz are the first ones to be dumped.

2.title: Episode #6.2
2.plot: Passing through the HQ session, tasks which test the emotional quotient and strength, the Splitsvillans are introduced to a dangerous twist, which is called 'The Book of Hell'.

3.title: Episode #6.3
3.plot: The day starts with the next HQ session followed by 'Circle of Strength', a task to test the physical strength and intelligence. In the end, Nawab is dumped by the queen.

4.title: Episode #6.4
4.plot: The day starts with a task based on strength and intelligence. Splitsvillans put their maximum efforts to win. However, Aman and Pari are found lacking behind, as they are dumped.

5.title: Episode #6.5
5.plot: It's the best part of the show, so far, that shows how intelligent the Splitsvillans are, in the 'Honeybee Competition'. At the dumping ground, Param harshly dumps Ruby.

6.title: Episode #6.6
6.plot: In the HQ session, the men show off their biceps. After that, there's another funny competition, the day ends with a dumping session. Ashwini is dumped in this episode.

7.title: Episode #6.7
7.plot: The ex-splitsvillans are brought back to fight their way into the splitsvilla. Arijit and Purvee get eliminated due to their poor performance in the task.

8.title: Episode #6.8
8.plot: The contestants choose their candidates to challenge the current king and queen. However, Param and Mandy retain their positions in the Villa.

9.title: Episode #6.9
9.plot: Hotness quotient gives the girls a chance to select the most disgusting guy. A South Indian cinema based dance battle is set. Nitin gets dumped in the end.

10.title: Episode #6.10
10.plot: Splitsvillans participate in a South Indian tradition where they have to recognize their partner in an interesting way. In the end, Pari gets dumped by Param.

11.title: Episode #6.11
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

12.title: Episode #6.12
12.plot: The king selects his two favorites who lost in a competition and made him fight for his throne. Finalists are sorted, but a twist is presented concerning the ex-splitsvillans.

13.title: Episode #6.13
13.plot: It's the grand finale and ex-splitsvillans choose Prabjhot and Satakshi to fight against the king and the queen. They succeed in defeating Subuhi and Gaurav. In the final round Param and Mandy triumph the show by winning the throne.

1.title: Episode #7.1
1.plot: It's the grand finale and ex-splitsvillans choose Prabjhot and Satakshi to fight against the king and the queen. They succeed in defeating Subuhi and Gaurav. In the final round Param and Mandy triumph the show by winning the throne.

2.title: Episode #7.2
2.plot: The boys nominate the girls whom they want to eliminate. The nominated girls challenge the remaining girls for the battle to survive. Scarlett becomes the first queen contender.

3.title: Episode #7.3
3.plot: The girls compete for the Queen's throne in an exciting task, where they have juice the fruits using their body, Khushi becomes the first queen. The boys showcase their talent to impress the girls.

4.title: Episode #7.4
4.plot: Shravan defeats Ashwini in the task for the King's throne and becomes the first King of Splitsvilla 7. With twists and turns in the dumping ground, Sonali and Simran are eliminated from the show.

5.title: Episode #7.5
5.plot: Boys prove their strength in a task called 'Token of Love'. Ayaz and his team win the 'Awesome Threesome' task. The love triangle between Ashwini, Sanjana and Scarlett continues.

6.title: Episode #7.6
6.plot: Girls get a chance to date the King in order to impress him and be safe from getting dumped. With a lot of twists and turns from the book of fortune, King Shravan dumps Pooja and Heena.

7.title: Episode #7.7
7.plot: Dana Vana, the wild card entrant escalates the boys' excitement for making a connection to survive in the game. Mayank Pawar emerges as the contender for the King's throne and battles with King Shravan.

8.title: Episode #7.8
8.plot: Shravan manages to save his throne from Mayank Gandhi as well as Mayank Pawar. The banished boy, Rishabh makes a shocking decision in the dumping ground. Unnati, Palak, and Savita are eliminated.

9.title: Episode #7.9
9.plot: The strong connection and mutual understanding between the contestants is tested in the 'Pataate Raho Session'. The game changer, Rishabh gets a chance to come back from banishment zone.

10.title: Episode #7.10
10.plot: The boys get a chance to date and impress the Queen for their survival. Ayaz is sent into the banishment zone. Two new wild card entries, Yasir Khan and Ranji Chopra surprise everyone.

11.title: Episode #7.11
11.plot: Nikhil and Sunny bring a hilariously quirky task, 'Dumbolina' to test the girls' intelligence. Later, It's time for the girls to impress the boys with their sizzling dance performances.

12.title: Episode #7.12
12.plot: Nikhil reveals hilarious secrets about the boys' life in a quirky task called 'Badmaash Bhediya'. The book of fortune saves Ranji from being dumped. Jacqueline is eliminated from the show.

13.title: Episode #7.13
13.plot: It's time for the banished boys to return to the villa through a task, 'Enchanted Forest'. The book of fortune surprises everyone in the dumping ground. Queen Khushi dumps Rishabh and he gets eliminated.

14.title: Episode #7.14
14.plot: The boys showcase their physical abilities and the girls find the stinkiest boy. Later, the boys compete in a dance competition to be safe from the dumping zone.

15.title: Episode #7.15
15.plot: Boys try their best to impress the Queen by giving her lovely gifts. Later, Sunny Leone brings the truth and dare game in the 'Pataate Raho' session to decide the two Queen contenders.

16.title: Episode #7.16
16.plot: The battle for the Queen's throne begins with a quirky task named 'Tomatina'. Dana Vana becomes the Queen by defeating Khushi and Rashi. Mayank Pawar is eliminated.

17.title: Episode #7.17
17.plot: The girls have to eat red chillies for a wrong answer by their connection in the 'Patate Raho' task. Abhishek dethrones Shravan in a challenging task and becomes the new King.

18.title: Episode #7.18
18.plot: A series of betrayals and emotional outbursts escalate the friction between the contestants in the dumping ground. Everyone is surprised when the ex-contestants enter in the villa.

19.title: Episode #7.19
19.plot: It's time to decide the final 2 couples to compete for the title of Ultimate King and Queen. After an adventurous treasure hunt, Mayank Gandhi-Scarlett and Abhishek-Khushi enter the finale.

20.title: Episode #7.20
20.plot: Mayank Gandhi and Scarlett Rose defeat Abhishek Malik and Khushi Bhat in the Grand Finale wrestling task. They are crowned as the Ultimate King and Queen of Splitsvilla season 7.

1.title: Episode #8.1
1.plot: The season begins with the introduction of contestants followed by the dumping ground session. Sunny Leone then introduces a new twist.

2.title: Episode #8.2
2.plot: 8 celebrity boys have joined the contest. The 'Wheel of Success' will reveal the talent of the boys and then the girls will decide whom they want to save.

3.title: Episode #8.3
3.plot: Alisha, Enakshi and Harshita get dumped. Later, the girls choose their male partners for the 'Pichkari' task. Utkarsh and Sana win the task.

4.title: Episode #8.4
4.plot: Veronica, Ashmita and Sharika get dumped. Followed by a couple of quarrels between the contestants, the new twist is that all the 16 boys are in the dumping zone.

5.title: Episode #8.5
5.plot: Love is in the air as contestants choose their dates. Eight of the boys become safe from the dumping zone. There's a twist as a new girl is introduced as the queen.

6.title: Episode #8.6
6.plot: With the shocking entry of ex Splitsvillian, Subuhi Joshi as the first queen, eight guys are dumped. The 'Real Scent of Love' task is performed to decide the first king.

7.title: Episode #8.7
7.plot: A thrilling tension rises among the contestants when the quest for the 'Ultimate King' is put forth. The face of the game changes as Paras becomes the King.

8.title: Episode #8.8
8.plot: The 'Splitsvillans' have a chance to save themselves from getting dumped by winning as a couple. Later, a pool date is arranged for the girls with the King.

9.title: Episode #8.9
9.plot: In this episode, Zaan and Ishaan get into an altercation. Vanessa reveals that Ish is in a relationship with someone outside the show, leading to his elimination. Viren is also told to leave.

10.title: Episode #8.10
10.plot: The girls get a chance to be the contender to challenge Subuhi's throne. The boys select one more contender for the Queen's throne.

11.title: Episode #8.11
11.plot: Subuhi retains her throne and uses her power to bring Prince back in the show. Prince safeguards himself from entering the dumping ground.

12.title: Episode #8.12
12.plot: The boys in the dumping zone compete with each other in a 'Bull fight' for immunity. Amaad and Ishaan end up in the dumping zone.

13.title: Episode #8.13
13.plot: With a series of twists in the dumping ground, Reshu and Vanessa get dumped. Prince pairs up with Anuki and together, they win the task and immunity.

14.title: Episode #8.14
14.plot: In the chocolate pool fight, Karishma fights her way into the safe zone. Later, the Queen, Subuhi chooses to abandon her throne.

15.title: Episode #8.15
15.plot: Mia is eliminated with an unbelievable twist in the dumping ground. Prince is chosen as the contender for the throne. Prince wins the task and becomes the King.

16.title: Episode #8.16
16.plot: On a date with King Prince, the girls try to impress him in order to become the new Queen and Priyanka wins. Rannvijay opens the 'Book of fortune'.

17.title: Episode #8.17
17.plot: The bonding between contestants is tested in a fun filled quiz. A new girl, Sophiya enters the villa and the boys try to impress her. Later, the contestants have to impress the tourists and earn money.

18.title: Episode #8.18
18.plot: Contestants try to impress the King and the Queen on their respective dates. The game changing twists from the book of fortune surprises everyone. Paras is banished and Priyanka is eliminated.

19.title: Episode #8.19
19.plot: Ishaan defeats Paras and Amaad to come back to the villa, while the both of them are eliminated. The contestants pair up to compete in a painfully romantic task, which Yash and Sophiya win.

20.title: Episode #8.20
20.plot: Contestants try their best to impress the King and the Queen in order to be safe from the elimination. The dumping ground brings a big surprise. For the first time, Splitsvilla has two Queens.

21.title: Episode #8.21
21.plot: It's time to decide the final couples for the Grand Finale. Utkarsh-Sana and Prince-Anuki become the finalists. Zaan-Karishma defeat Ishaan-Subuhi in the task to enter the finale.

22.title: Episode #8.22
22.plot: In the Grand Finale, the finalists compete in a dance challenge. The toughest finale task awaits the two couples. Prince and Anuki win it to become the ultimate King and Queen.

1.title: Episode #9.1
1.plot: Rannvijay and Sunny present this season's contestants, competing in an all new format where the girls call the shots. After the guys and girls chat with each other, the 6 princesses have to choose 2 boys each.

2.title: Episode #9.2
2.plot: Abhishek knocks Ishaan out in the 'Kiss or Smash' task. In the next challenge, the guys take shots at guessing the princesses' secrets. Find out who goes to the 'Dumping Zone' amidst all the conspiracies and conflicts.

3.title: Episode #9.3
3.plot: The Queen Bee Round begins where 3 princesses are pitted against the other 3. The men undergo many hurdles to qualify their princesses for the final round, where just 2 princesses remain. The 2 then compete for the 'Queen' title.

4.title: Episode #9.4
4.plot: Sunny Leone burns the stage with her performance. The princesses follow up and wow the boys with their dance performance. The battle for the throne continues when the boys are asked to wrestle each other.

5.title: Episode #9.5
5.plot: The boys go on a date with 'Queen' Martina. Watch how they try to woo her to escape the elimination. Later the princesses get the temperature soaring with their hot selfies.

6.title: Episode #9.6
6.plot: A new princess is here to make things more interesting for Martina, the queen, and everyone else. Shreeradhe spends a lot of time with Varun and even gets the power to bring a dumped contestant back.

7.title: Episode #9.7
7.plot: The wild card princess Shreeradhe makes the fiery queen Martina's blood boil as she brings Karan Chhabra back on the show. With that, the real war between Martina and Shreeradhe begins, followed by a fracas between Karan and Nick on the dumping ground.

8.title: Episode #9.8
8.plot: After a thrilling tussle with Martina for the Queen's title, the princesses break some eggs over each other's heads. In a shocking twist, the girls will now be in the 'Dumping Zone', too.

9.title: Episode #9.9
9.plot: The war between Mayuri, Rajnandini and Shreeradhe is on. However, Queen Martina holds the power to dump one princess. Find out who shares the throne with the fiery queen. Later, the princesses and their partners compete in a game to win the Golden Bracelet.

10.title: Episode #9.10
10.plot: What happens when the love connection of Queen Martina and Queen Rajnandini are in the dumping zone? Well, get ready for some high voltage drama. Watch how the two Queens settle old scores and reach new heights to save their love.

11.title: Episode #9.11
11.plot: Two new entries, Zain and Ayaan, woo the princesses and spice up the tussle with their privileged powers as the purple-dyed hair beauty, Sunny Leone, announces the clash for the new queen. The real fun begins when the boys' talent show is interrupted by a nasty body shaming confrontation between evil queen Rajnandini and Martina. Post this fiery cat-fight, the war gets intense between Kavya, Martina, Shreeradhe and Mia as they tussle for the throne. Find out who wins it.

12.title: Episode #9.12
12.plot: Known for love and connections, the game faces its true test when the Queens, Rajnandini and Kavya are faced with a decision that could cost them their thrones . With their game-play at stake, the boys need to sell used items and make money.

13.title: Episode #9.13
13.plot: The 'licktionary' task will showcase the creative side of the boys who will draw images for their connections to identify, using their tongue. Definitely, lots of tasting to do. And yes, the Princesses do some licking too. The humorous 'Love triangle' round on the beach follows, where teams need to showcase their tactics. The balloon bursting session is hilarious. The verdict says the winning team will get an immunity.

14.title: Episode #9.14
14.plot: The contestants who lost the 'Love triangle' task have no option but to do things as per the Queens' demands. Everyone except Mia, Ayan and Zain are in the danger zone, but the Book of Fortune turns things on its head. A princess even gets the chance to reverse the Queens' decision.

15.title: Episode #9.15
15.plot: The 'Patate Raho' session will be exceptionally entrancing, particularly for the girls, as they will pick the boy with the best body part from the given list. Enjoying the task thoroughly, the blindfolded girls touch different body parts of all the boys and rate them accordingly. This is sure to be fun. An immune Nikhil, has the power to restrict two princesses from taking part in the 'Zor Lagake Haisha' task.

16.title: Episode #9.16
16.plot: Sparks fly high when Kavya and Evil Queen Rajnandini get into a cat-fight over Mia's connections. Earlier, Mia's insecurity gets the better of her and she unleashes her fury on Nikhil, thereby creating a rift between the groups in the Villa. Nikhil gets a piece of Sunny's mind, when he does not let Mia join his inner circle. Rajnandini's fear for her connection makes her call for the 'Book of Fortune'. However, the 'Book of Fortune' declares an exciting and nail-biting verdict.

17.title: Episode #9.17
17.plot: The 'bajatey raho' round starts with a rapid fire session, as Shreeradhe becomes the obvious victim for her alleged new connection, Karan Khanna. Gurmeet and Kavya's public display of affection doesn't seem to be going well with the 'Evil queen' Rajnandini, as she silently awaits to seek revenge from Kavya for dumping Archie. Rajnandini's prayers seem to be answered, when Gurmeet lands in the dumping round.

18.title: Episode #9.18
18.plot: Getting onto the bad side of Evil Queen Rajnandini was definitely not a good idea. Kavya learns it the hard way as Rajnandini makes her literally beg to save Gurmeet. Will Rajnandini let go of the opportunity? In the dumping ground, two guys and one couple bite the dust but the last turn of the 'Book of Fortune' throws some surprises.

19.title: Episode #9.19
19.plot: The battle to win the throne becomes more intense by the arrival of the ex-splitsvillans. For securing a place in the finale, two couples with the help of an ex-splitsvillan, indulge in the last rumble. Unhappy by her destiny, Mayuri makes a scapegoat of Karan Khanna. Sparks fly when a monstrous argument ignites between Ayaan and Nikhil. Will Shreeradhe find a partner to perform in the last task?

20.title: Episode #9.20
20.plot: The Evil Queen-Rajnandini, Bold Queen-Kavya, and the Fiery Queen-Martina, pair along their fierce connections for a face-off in the Grand Finale. For the first time on Splitsvilla, a 'King' will be crowned along with the 'Ultimate Queen'. With the Splitsvilla throne in sight, the three couples perform a series of three extremely challenging tasks. Who will be crowned the 'Ultimate King and Queen'?

1.title: Episode #10.1
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.title: MTV Splitsvilla
plot: Young boys and girls try to secure a place. Boys and girls compete tasks to stay in the show and mingle with others to find love. A couple is crowned as winner. There are a lot of fights, jealousy, friendship and love between contestants.::Wikipedia
